definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out

sentences.english: Surrounded by a bunch of bright light, a gentle circle round halo.
sentences.chinese: 周圍有一束燦爛的光，一圈圈柔和的圓暈。
